text: V Sudnyy den', kogda My ikh sprosim i soobshchim o tom, chto oni sdelali na zemle, ikh deyaniya v blizhayshey zhizni budut vzvesheny, i po spravedlivosti budet im vozdayaniye. Te, u kogo bol'she dobrykh deyaniy, chem grekhov, okazhutsya v vyigryshe i budut schastlivy. My ikh uberezhom ot ada i vvedom v ray
